raw_comment: I noticed that young women tend to reach out to their parents more than men. I wonder why women do it more than men and I think it is because they are more attached to their parents. This relates to me because one day I will move out and go to college and I will probably text or call my parents a lot. Why do women reach out to their parents more often than men?
ace_sentences: I noticed that young women tend to reach out to their parents more often than young men.
I wonder why women reach out to their parents more often than men.
I think that women are more attached to their parents than men.
One day I will move out.
One day I will go to college.
I will probably text my parents a lot.
I will probably call my parents a lot.
Why do women reach out to their parents more often than men?
